dct_title_s: Bacon's picture-map of the western war area
dct_description_sm: "This view shows the area in the way it would reveal itself to a Bird or from an Aeroplane on flying from South to North, and thus perspective is avoided and approximate topographical accuracy is retained."
Pictorial map showing cities and towns, mountains, waterways, main roads between towns, islands, boundaries.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
